publication.title: Acceptance Test of a Commercially Available Software for Automatic Image Registration of Computed Tomography (CT), Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) And 99mTc-methoxyisobutylisonitrile (MIBI) Single-Photon Emission Computed Tomography (SPECT) Brain Images
publication.authors: gianfranco loi,marco dominietto,irene manfredda,eleonora mones,alessandro carriero,eugenio inglese,marco krengli
publication.keyword: Brain Imaging;Computed Tomography;Image Registration;Magnetic Resonance Image;Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography;
